entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 6:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
